content:
1. [CRM Cleanup and Tagging]
Task: Organize and clean up existing leads in CRM, assign relevant tags for improved segmentation
KPIs: Number of leads cleaned up and tagged, increase in data accuracy and completeness
Benefits: Improved lead organization and segmentation, better targeting of leads with personalized messaging, increased lead conversion rates
2. [Lead Source Identification]
Task: Identify lead sources and track lead generation from each source
KPIs: Number of leads generated from each source, engagement and conversion rates for each source
Benefits: Better understanding of the most effective lead sources, ability to focus marketing efforts on high-performing sources, increased lead generation and conversion rates
3. [Lead Enrichment and Scoring]
Task: Gather additional information on leads and assign lead scores for prioritization
KPIs: Number of leads enriched with additional information, lead scoring accuracy and effectiveness
Benefits: Improved lead prioritization, increased engagement with highly scored leads, increased conversion rates and ROI
4. [New Lead Qualification]
Task: Develop a lead qualification process to identify highly engaged leads
KPIs: Number of leads qualified, engagement rates for qualified leads
Benefits: More effective lead qualification process, increased engagement and interest from qualified leads, increased lead conversion rates
5. [Lead Nurturing Strategy]
Task: Develop a lead nurturing strategy to move leads through the funnel
KPIs: Engagement rates for nurturing campaigns, number of leads progressing through the funnel, event attendance rates
Benefits: Increased lead engagement and conversion rates, improved lead retention and loyalty, increased investment in the company
6. [Lead Nurturing KPIs and Deliverables]
Task: Develop and implement KPIs for lead nurturing efforts, create relevant deliverables such as content calendars
KPIs: Lead conversion rates, event attendance rates, engagement rates with content and resources
Deliverables: Lead nurturing strategy document, event planning and content production calendars, educational resources and content pieces
Benefits: Better visibility into the effectiveness of lead nurturing efforts, increased engagement and conversion rates, improved brand recognition and awareness
7. [CRM System Review and Update]
Task: Review and update CRM system to improve data accuracy and relevance
KPIs: Data accuracy and completeness rates, lead engagement rates
Benefits: Improved data accuracy and relevance, better lead targeting and segmentation, increased lead conversion rates
8. [Lead Scoring Implementation]
Task: Implement lead scoring system to prioritize highly engaged leads
KPIs: Lead scoring accuracy and effectiveness, highly engaged lead conversion rates
Benefits: Better prioritization of highly engaged leads, increased conversion rates and ROI, improved lead qualification and targeting
9. [Key Metrics Monitoring and Analysis]
Task: Monitor and analyze key metrics such as lead conversion rates, engagement rates, and ROI
KPIs: Lead conversion rates, engagement rates, ROI
Benefits: Data-driven decision making, improved lead generation and nurturing efforts, increased lead conversion rates and ROI
10. [Sales and Investment Team Communication]
Task: Establish regular communication channels between sales and investment teams for feedback and collaboration
KPIs: Feedback on lead quality and progress, increased lead conversion rates
Benefits: Improved lead targeting and qualification, increased alignment and collaboration between teams, increased lead conversion rates and ROI.
